summary: The dramatic inside story of the monumental collision of interests at Ground Zero in the decade after 9/11.
cast: Scott Raab|Philip Nobel|Larry Silverstein|George Pataki|Roland Betts|Janno Lieber|Rosaleen Tallon|Kenneth Ringler|Daniel Libeskind|Raphael Vinoly|David Childs|Michael Arad|Michael Bloomberg|David Paterson|Chris Ward
title: 16 Acres
